title: why trying to stop AI is stup*d

channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast

transcription: {"text": "There's this point at which you're gonna have a 1.0 brain. Basically the AI is going to equal a human brain. Part that I think people miss on that is what happens is the feedback loop to a 1.01 brain happens instantly because the brain then can write its own code to improve itself. The thing is the 10x brain is now within a few hours. The 100x brain happens within a few minutes after that and then the 1,000,000x brain is the week later. When you get to 1.0, there is no going back ever for anyone, for any reason. The only thing scarier than the United States having artificial intelligence is China having it before us. So we're gonna have artificial intelligence. People need to get over this idea that we're gonna somehow stop it. It's inevitable.
